001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
004import com.google.common.io.ByteStreams;
005
006import javax.mail.Message;
007import java.io.*;
008import java.time.LocalDateTime;
009import java.util.Collections;
010import java.util.Optional;
011import java.util.jar.Attributes;
012import java.util.jar.JarFile;
013import java.util.jar.Manifest;
014import java.util.zip.ZipEntry;
015import java.util.zip.ZipInputStream;
016
017import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.Submit.ManifestAttributes.*;
018
019class ProjectSubmissionsProcessor extends StudentEmailAttachmentProcessor {
020
021  @VisibleForTesting
022  static final String EMAIL_FOLDER_NAME = "Project Submissions";
023
024  public ProjectSubmissionsProcessor(File directory, GradeBook gradeBook) {
025    super(directory, gradeBook);
026  }
027
028  @Override
029  public Iterable<? extends String> getSupportedContentTypes() {
030    return Collections.singleton("application/zip");
031  }
032
033  @Override
034  public void processAttachment(Message message, String fileName, InputStream inputStream, String contentType) {
035    debug("    File name: " + fileName);
036    debug("    InputStream: " + inputStream);
037
038    byte[] bytes;
039    try {
040      bytes = readAttachmentIntoByteArray(inputStream);
041
042    } catch (IOException ex) {
043      logException("While copying \"" + fileName + " \" to a byte buffer", ex);
044      return;
045    }
046
047
048    Manifest manifest;
049    try {
050      manifest = getManifestFromByteArray(bytes);
051
052    } catch (IOException ex) {
053      logException("While reading jar file \"" + fileName + "\"", ex);
054      return;
055    }
056
057    try {
058      writeSubmissionToDisk(fileName, bytes, manifest);
059
060    } catch (IOException | SubmissionException ex) {
061      logException("While writing \"" + fileName + "\" to \"" + directory + "\"", ex);
062      return;
063    }
064
065    try {
066      noteSubmissionInGradeBook(manifest);
067
068    } catch (SubmissionException ex) {
069      logException("While noting submission from \"" + fileName + "\"", ex);
070    }
071
072  }
073
074  private byte[] readAttachmentIntoByteArray(InputStream inputStream) throws IOException {
075    byte[] bytes;
076    ByteArrayOutputStream baos = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
077    ByteStreams.copy(inputStream, baos);
078    bytes = baos.toByteArray();
079    return bytes;
080  }
081
082  private void writeSubmissionToDisk(String fileName, byte[] bytes, Manifest manifest) throws SubmissionException, IOException {
083    File projectDir = getProjectDirectory(manifest);
084
085    File file = new File(projectDir, fileName);
086    if (file.exists()) {
087      warnOfPreExistingFile(file);
088    }
089
090    info("Writing " + fileName + " to " + projectDir);
091
092    ByteStreams.copy(new ByteArrayInputStream(bytes), new FileOutputStream(file));
093  }
094
095  private File getProjectDirectory(Manifest manifest) throws SubmissionException, IOException {
096    String projectName = getProjectNameFromManifest(manifest.getMainAttributes());
097    File projectDir = new File(directory, projectName);
098    if (!projectDir.exists()) {
099      if(!projectDir.mkdirs()) {
100        throw new IOException("Could not create directory: " + projectDir);
101      }
102    }
103    return projectDir;
104  }
105
106  @VisibleForTesting
107  void noteSubmissionInGradeBook(Manifest manifest) throws SubmissionException {
108    Attributes attrs = manifest.getMainAttributes();
109
110    Student student = getStudentFromGradeBook(attrs);
111    Assignment project = getProjectFromGradeBook(attrs);
112    String note = getSubmissionNote(attrs);
113
114    Grade grade = student.getGrade(project);
115    if (grade == null) {
116      grade = new Grade(project, Grade.NO_GRADE);
117      student.setGrade(project.getName(), grade);
118    }
119    grade.addNote(note);
120
121    LocalDateTime submissionTime = getSubmissionTime(attrs);
122    grade.addSubmissionTime(submissionTime);
123
124    if (project.isSubmissionLate(submissionTime)) {
125      student.addLate(project.getName());
126    }
127  }
128
129  private LocalDateTime getSubmissionTime(Attributes attrs) throws SubmissionException {
130    String string = getSubmissionTimeString(attrs);
131    return Submit.ManifestAttributes.parseSubmissionTime(string);
132  }
133
134  private String getSubmissionNote(Attributes attrs) throws SubmissionException {
135    String studentName = getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, USER_NAME, "Student name missing from manifest");
136    String submissionTime = getSubmissionTimeString(attrs);
137    String submissionComment = getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, SUBMISSION_COMMENT, "Submission comment missing from manifest");
138
139    return "Submitted by: " + studentName + "\n" +
140      "On: " + submissionTime + "\n" +
141      "With comment: " + submissionComment + "\n";
142  }
143
144  private String getSubmissionTimeString(Attributes attrs) throws SubmissionException {
145    return getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, SUBMISSION_TIME, "Submission time missing from manifest");
146  }
147
148  private Assignment getProjectFromGradeBook(Attributes attrs) throws SubmissionException {
149    String projectName = getProjectNameFromManifest(attrs);
150
151    Assignment assignment = this.gradeBook.getAssignment(projectName);
152    if (assignment == null) {
153      throw new SubmissionException("Assignment with name \"" + projectName + "\" is not in grade book");
154    }
155    return assignment;
156  }
157
158  private String getProjectNameFromManifest(Attributes attrs) throws SubmissionException {
159    return getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, PROJECT_NAME, "Project name missing from manifest");
160  }
161
162  private Student getStudentFromGradeBook(Attributes attrs) throws SubmissionException {
163    String studentId = getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, USER_ID, "Student Id missing from manifest");
164    String studentName = getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, USER_NAME, "Student Name missing from manifest");
165    String studentEmail = getManifestAttributeValue(attrs, USER_EMAIL, "Student Email missing from manifest");
166
167    Optional<Student> optional = this.gradeBook.studentsStream().filter(student ->
168      hasStudentId(student, studentId) ||
169      hasFirstNameLastName(student, studentName) ||
170      hasNickNameLastName(student, studentName) ||
171      hasEmail(student, studentEmail)).findAny();
172
173    return optional.orElseThrow(() -> {
174      String s = "Could not find student with id \"" + studentId + "\" or name \"" +
175        studentName + "\" or email \"" + studentEmail + "\" in grade book";
176      return new SubmissionException(s);
177    });
178  }
179
180  private boolean hasEmail(Student student, String studentEmail) {
181    return studentEmail.equals(student.getEmail());
182  }
183
184  private boolean hasNickNameLastName(Student student, String studentName) {
185    return studentName.equals(student.getNickName() + " " + student.getLastName());
186  }
187
188  private boolean hasFirstNameLastName(Student student, String studentName) {
189    return studentName.equals(student.getFirstName() + " " + student.getLastName());
190  }
191
192  private boolean hasStudentId(Student student, String studentId) {
193    return student.getId().equals(studentId);
194  }
195
196
197  private String getManifestAttributeValue(Attributes attrs, Attributes.Name attribute, String message) throws SubmissionException {
198    String value = attrs.getValue(attribute);
199    if (value == null) {
200      throwSubmissionException(message);
201    }
202    return value;
203  }
204
205  private void throwSubmissionException(String message) throws SubmissionException {
206    throw new SubmissionException(message);
207
208  }
209
210  private Manifest getManifestFromByteArray(byte[] file) throws IOException {
211    ZipInputStream in = new ZipInputStream(new ByteArrayInputStream(file));
212    for (ZipEntry entry = in.getNextEntry(); entry != null ; entry = in.getNextEntry()) {
213      if (entry.getName().equals(JarFile.MANIFEST_NAME)) {
214        Manifest manifest = new Manifest();
215        manifest.read(in);
216        in.closeEntry();
217        return manifest;
218
219      } else {
220        in.closeEntry();
221      }
222    }
223
224    throw new IllegalStateException("Zip file did not contain manifest");
225  }
226
227  private void warnOfPreExistingFile(File file) {
228    warn("Overwriting existing file \"" + file + "\"");
229  }
230
231  @Override
232  public String getEmailFolder() {
233    return EMAIL_FOLDER_NAME;
234  }
235
236}
